name: Find & Replace
description:
I couldn't find a plugin that let me find and replace text using regular expressions, so I threw this together. Maybe you'll find it handy, too.


Usage:

  • Find and replace operates on any text found in your selection or, if you have nothing selected, it will search the entire active page
  • Toggle case sensitivity and / or regular expression matching (if you please)
  • Mash the big blue button


Please send me any bugs or feature requests.


Enjoy :)
